dev-scripts.db-reset: npx dotenv sequelize db:seed:undo:all && npx dotenv sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npx dotenv sequelize db:migrate && npx dotenv sequelize db:seed:all

prod-build-scripts.build-for-final-submission: npm install && npm run build && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:migrate && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:seed:all
prod-build-scripts.build-during-testing-to-reset-db: npm install && npm run build && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:seed:undo:all && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:migrate:undo:all && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:migrate && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:seed:all
